attributes.action: present an Act to Parliament nullifying the Matrimonial Causes Act 1973
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Removing the Matrimonial Causes Act 1973 would allow everyone the freedom to marry the individual of their choosing regardless of sex. This would end the sexual apartheid brought about by the introduction of "Civil Partnerships" and open the institution of marriage to all citizens of age and sound mind.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
